"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a0b87b63687214b3001d92#post_55a0b87b63687214b3001d92
Personally I think they might because unlike humans making computers sing better is a programming problem rather than learning to sing.  There's a couple singing programs that almost sound as good as humans; in say ten years or such when they sound hyper idealistically they might catch on. . . or AAA companies will not want to pay people millions of dollars and force the industry to accept it to be cheap.

We'll see pretty soon though.
